import { Playground, Props } from 'docz'
import {Flex, Avatar} from '../index'

<Playground>
    <Flex row wrap content="space-around" align="center">
        <Avatar type="primary" char="UN" /> 
        <Avatar size={66} source={{uri: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506252374453-ef5237291d83?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=60"}} /> 
        <Avatar size={66} char="IK" source={{uri: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1506252374453-ef5237291d83?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=crop&w=900&q=60"}} /> 
        <Avatar type="success" alpha={0.5} char="IT" /> 
    </Flex>
</Playground>
